name: Dear Earthlings, You're Not Alone
description:
Submitted for Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam.

A civilization from the Pleiades star cluster answered a signal that we sent from the Arecibo Radio Telescope. They sent us this message:

"Dear Earthlings, you are not alone. Unfortunately we have information that a hostile civilization will attempt to invade planet Earth on year 2022. You are not advanced enough to repel the incoming invasion from the Reptilians of Alpha Draconis. We the Pleiadians from the Alcyone star system are going to aid you to defend the Earth."

Controls:

Press W,A,S,D to move. Press SPACE to shoot.
